body:
I just got a second server and I am really nubby with plugins especially when it comes to coding (ive seen 2 pages for bungeecord and it was showing coding .-.

My question is, could anybody help me with putting the 2 servers together with bungeecord?

title: BungeeCord setup help

replies.body: Yes, feel free to add me on Skype: MrTeckky

replies.body:
Make a youtube video about your server. Put IP in description.
Don't put it here. I will look it up. Boom. That's not advertising.
